CWEs: CWE-79: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting')
description: The function unique_name_653 is vulnerable to Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) attacks. The function uses the $F(u).escapeHTML() method to escape HTML characters, but this method is not always effective in preventing XSS attacks. An attacker could potentially inject malicious scripts into the web page, leading to various security issues such as data theft, session hijacking, and defacement of the website.
